ROOT.GetVoltage: SELECT CODE,NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE WHERE EFFECT_FLAG='Y'
ROOT.GetLine: SELECT ID,NAME,VOLTAGE_TYPE,START_ST_ID,END_ST_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B UNION SELECT ID,NAME,VOLTAGE_TYPE,START_ST_ID,END_ST_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B
ROOT.GetAcross: SELECT line_id,across_type,ACROSS_OBJ_ID,across_longitude as longitude,across_latitude as latitude FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TOWER_ACROSS_INFO
ROOT.GetGridLevel: SELECT CODE,NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_GRIDLEVEL WHERE EFFECT_FLAG='Y'
ROOT.GetDccLevel: SELECT CODE,NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_DCCLEVEL WHERE EFFECT_FLAG='Y'
ROOT.IsAdmin: select u.user_id,g.user_id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_sys_ua_user_b u left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_SYS_UA_USERGROUPUSER_B g on g.user_id=u.user_id and g.usergroup_id='79391aceedce11e6a6ef54ee7536cc52' where u.user_name={0}
ROOT.GetHvdcSysStations: SELECT ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B WHERE HVDCSYS_ID IN ({0}) UNION ALL SELECT ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B WHERE DCSYSTEM_ID IN ({0})
ROOT.GetHvdcSysLines: SELECT ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B WHERE DCSYSTEM_ID IN ({0})
ROOT.GetAcLineEnds: select line_id,id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_aclineend_b where line_id IN ({0})
ROOT.GetDcLineEnds: select line_id,id from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_dev_dclineend_b where line_id IN ({0})
